item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started Have you downloaded Godot yet? You can get it here: https://godotengine.org In this section:

item.title: GDScript
item.description: Â GDScript GDScript is Godot’s built-in scripting language. Its syntax is based on Python, so if you’re familiar with that language, you’ll feel right at home. In this chapter, we’ll introduce the language and get you up to speed with how it works. In this section:
